title: No Fee Luxury 3 Bed 2 Bath in Downtown Brooklyn + Private Terrace
map_address: 18 Sixth Avenue near Pacific Street and Dean Street
posting_body: ['No Brokers Fee', 'Luxury 3 Bed 2 Bath in Downtown Brooklyn + Private Terrace', 'Listing ID #: 464008', 'Address: 18 Sixth Avenue, #2709', 'Price: $9,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0 (3 Bed 2 Bath)', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Floor: 27', 'Building Amenities', 'Health Club', 'Pool', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Storage', 'Roof Deck', 'Concierge', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Hardwood', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Outdoor Space', 'Private Deck', 'Renovated', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Terrace', 'Walk In Closet', 'Microwave', 'Free Rent', 'Welcome home to this luxury finished unit, Enjoy mornings from your private terrace in this east facing 2BD with a den with walk-in closets and a four-piece bath.', 'This 2BD/2BA with a den can be experienced as a third bedroom.', '*Photos may not be of actual apartment but are representative of interior finishes.', '*ADVERTISED NET EFFECTIVE RENT BASED ON 1 MONTH FREE*', 'BUILDING DESCRIPTION: Designed by Perkins Eastman, with amenities designed by Lemay + Escobar, Brooklyn Crossing offers 51 stories of custom-appointed residences and amenities to create the next chapter in your life story.', 'Studio and 1- to 3-bedroom apartments, with resident amenities designed for being still or being in the center of the action, whenever you choose.', 'Here, space abounds to stretch solo or spin with friends in the expansive fitness center, make it a movie night in the resident Screening Room, or people-watch on the open-air rooftop complete with a Sky Lounge, outdoor pool, and 360-degree views stretching from the Manhattan skyline to Rockaway Beach.', 'Situated in prime Prospect Heights, you’re minutes from epic culture and culinary fare in every direction, including historic landmarks like the Brooklyn Academy of Music and dynamic new destinations like Barclays Center.', 'Add to that 10 train lines one block away, and really, you can go anywhere you want from here.', 'David Kusayev', 'Phone: 718-864-4543', 'Mobile: 718-864-4543', 'Fax: 718-456-7188', 'Email: <URL>', 'Hillel Realty Group \xa0 718-864-4543 \xa0 718-864-4543 \xa0 FAX 718-456-7188 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text David Kusayev at 718-864-4543']
